name: Faraday Media
tag_list: attention, particls, dataportability, apml, lifestreams, advertising, media-2.0, ajax
overview:
Faraday Media is all about attention; they create products that help users “experience a personally relevant Internet.”

Faraday Media builds tools to observe user behavior - Attention - to determine user interests. They then apply that knowledge in a way that creates personally relevant Internet experiences.

Their APML open standard allows users to own their Attention Profile. Their Engagd platform allows software developers to add Attention features to their own products. Particls helps users consolidate all their notifications from social networks and news sources for easy, filtered viewing while they work.
